question: Meaning of these names: Fabbiha, Shanaz, Ruzina, Farhana, Raj, Raza & Ibrahim
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Fabbiha- Could not find

Shanaz- Name of a flower

Ruzina - One who is self-possesses and composed

Farhana- Happy

Raj- while raj means a bricklayer, it is normally used as a shortened form of Raja meaning a prince or king.

Raza - Correct pronunciation Radha- one who is content and pleased

Ibrahim- Name of a Prophet and also of the son of Nabi (Sallallahu Alaihi Wa Sallam)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
